title: Chkumi Waterfall
about: The Chkumi waterfall is located in Lechkhumi, near the village of Chkumi, at 715 meters above sea level. It flows down into a groove-shaped deepening of the rock and is hidden in the trees, which is a stunning sight. This place is wonderful both in summer and in picturesque autumn. The Chkumi waterfall attracts everyone who is fond of wandering and relaxing in the tranquility of nature. It is situated quite close to the road, so if you desire to spend a day with your family or friends in a pleasant environment, this is the perfect place to do it.
